DCN.jl Documentation

Cryptography primitives

DCN.generate_keypair — Function
generate_keypair()

Return the newly generated keypair (public_key, private_key)

source
DCN.sign — Function
sign(message, private_key)

Sign message using private_key and return the signature

source
DCN.verify_sig — Function
verify_sig(public_key, signature, data)

Verify the signature of data against public_key. Returns true if signature is valid.

source
DCN.hash — Function
hash(message)

Return the hash of a message.

source
hash(messages)

Return the hash of the sorted, concatenated array of messages.

source
